mng: classifier for horses, mules etc, Taiwan pr. [pi1], ordinary person, classifier for cloth: bolt, horsepower
variant of 匹[pi3], classifier for cloth: bolt

exm.mng: to mate or marry, to match, matching, compatible
to be equal to, to be well-matched, rival
ordinary man, ignorant person, coarse fellow

exm.pyn: Ào lín pǐ kè yùn dòng huì

exm.mng: lit. single spear and horse (idiom); fig. single-handed, unaccompanied
